sets.description: When at least 1 physical weapon is equipped, the damage of all elements is increased **12%/15%/18%/21%**. This effect works in the background and only the set with the highest advancement will take effect.

Releasing the weapon skill or discharge of a physical weapon, increase the damage done by all elements by **27%/31%/35%/39%** for **25** seconds. Stamina consumption is reduced by **40%** while using Little Hurricane. This effect works in the background and only the set with the highest advancement will take effect.
